extDescription.message: It's a manga viewer supports preload image, zoomable image and drag to view for some websites. It can save your view history on local or cloud (You need to login to FireFox (version >= 53) to save history to cloud).
It's a manga viewer supports preload image, zoomable image and drag to view for some websites. It can save your view history on local or cloud (You need a Google account).

refresh_target_page.message: Refresh the comic page and try again

not_supported.message: This page is not been supported

check_issue.message: There was a issue about target comic page, please check it and try again

file_format_support.message: Support zip, rar, cbz, cbr file

local_history_storage_in_used.message: Local history storage in used (1000 recrods max)

sync_history_storage_in_used.message: Sync history storage in used (When the storage is near full, old record will be deleted)

sync_support_notice.message: You need Firefox version >= 53 to synchronize history.

gallery_zoom_mode_type2_help_text.message: Zoom: ctrl + mouse wheel; Move vertically: mouse wheel

subscribe_failed.message: Something happened when subscribe the manga
